message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to own this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,250,000.  I believe this reflects its true value and leaves room for a beneficial agreement between us.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,800,000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is tempting, the value of this product is truly exceptional. To find a middle ground, I'm proposing a price of $2,000,000. This demonstrates my commitment to reaching a fair deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing a price of $1,900,000. I believe this is a fair price for a product of this value.
